attributes.action: Facilitate the Prefix of "Royal" to the town of Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the citizens of Wootton Bassett who have helped to carry the burden of loss to our servicemen this town should be known as Royal Wooton Bassett

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
